synopsis.text: Chisato Takatsukasa, a youthful-looking 35-year-old author, is overly protective of his 15-year-old son, Riju. Convinced that every male friend Riju brings home has ulterior motives, Chisato employs various schemes to scare them off. However, one individual remains undeterred: Shunsuke Sakaki, Riju's best friend, who harbors secret feelings for Chisato. As Chisato begins to reciprocate Shunsuke's affections, a complex love triangle emerges, leaving Riju's feelings uncertain. Meanwhile, Chisato's admiration for the enigmatic mystery author Saki Shunka adds another layer of intrigue to this captivating tale of love, family, and hidden motives.
